name: StartAuthorizationProcess
description:
Starts the authorization process for given requirements.

Use this tool to initiate the authorization process based on specified requirements. Ideal for cases where user authentication needs to be initiated or validated.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the user. Required to start the authorization process.

parameters.name: authorization_requirement_id
parameters.description: Set this ID for initiating authorization. Either this ID or the provider ID must be set.

value_schema.description: one of ID or ProviderID must be set

parameters.name: oauth2_scopes
parameters.description: A list of OAuth2 scopes that specify the level of access required for the authorization. Each scope should be provided as a string.

parameters.name: authorization_provider_id
parameters.description: The provider ID for authorization. One of ID or ProviderID must be set.

value_schema.description: one of ID or ProviderID must be set

parameters.name: authorization_provider_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of authorization provider to be used, such as 'OAuth2', 'SAML', etc.

parameters.name: redirection_uri_after_authorization
parameters.description: Optional URI to redirect the user after authorization. If provided, the user will be redirected to this specific address once the authorization process is complete.

value_schema.description: Optional: if provided, the user will be redirected to this URI after authorization

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the engine API.

parameters.name: auth_requirement.id
parameters.description: one of ID or ProviderID must be set

value_schema.description: one of ID or ProviderID must be set

parameters.name: auth_requirement.provider_id
parameters.description: one of ID or ProviderID must be set

value_schema.description: one of ID or ProviderID must be set

parameters.name: next_uri
parameters.description: Optional: if provided, the user will be redirected to this URI after authorization

value_schema.description: Optional: if provided, the user will be redirected to this URI after authorization
